info.author: Winston Wolff
classifiers: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)
info.description:
MakeBot is a simple IDE for Python. It is designed to allow students to start programming as quickly and 
easily as possible.  Just type in some Python code and press RUN.  You don't even have to save.  It's great 
for testing bits of code, or for doing graphics.  Includes "lunarrepair", a graphics package suitable for 
writing video games.
info.name: MakeBot
info.summary: A Simple IDE for Learning Python
info.html_description: MakeBot is a simple IDE for Python. It is designed to allow students to start programming as quickly and easily as possible. Just type in some Python code and press RUN. You don’t even have to save. It’s great for testing bits of code, or for doing graphics. Includes “lunarrepair”, a graphics package suitable for writing video games.
